_header: Saint Oswald the bishop was I-bore in England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Oswald, bishop, life of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, f. 191: prose.
_description: Life of St. Oswald the Bishop in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Oswald þe biscop was ibore her in engelondeOf heie men he
                    was icome as ic vnderstonde…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Vor is loue our lord haþ þer vair myracle ofte
                    iwroȝtGod lete ous to þe Ioie come þat he is Inne
                    ibroȝt

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint oswold þe bysschop was bore her in ingelondeof grete
                    lordes he was come as ich ondirstonde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…ffor ȝeue þu oure mysdedys þat we doþ ofte
                    amys& brynge vs in to þy kyngdom In þe ioye of heuene
                    blis

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Oswold was i bore heere in EngelondeOf heiȝe men he was
                    i come as ich vndurstonde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor his loue vr lord haþ þere feir Miracle i
                    wrouȝtGod lete vs to þe Ioye come þer he is inne i
                    brouȝt. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Oswold þe bisshop Was bore in EnglelondOf heye men he y
                    comen As I vnderstonde…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…ffor his loue oure lord haþ ofte fair miracle wroutheGod
                    let vs to þe ioye come þer he is inne brouhte
BodLauMis463.Attributed Title: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Oswold þe holi man was bore in IngelondOf hiȝe men
                    he was come as I vndirstond…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…ffor his loue oure lord haþ þere fair meracle ofte
                    þere wrouȝtNow god lete vs to þe ioye come þere he is
                    inne brouȝt

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
[S]eint oswol[d ]þe bissop was ibore in engelondeOf heȝe
                    men he was icome as ich vnderstonde…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…& oure lord haþ for his loue þere many miracles
                    y[wroȝt]Now god lete vs to þe ioye come þat he is inne
                    ybroȝte
OxfCCC431.Note: Portion of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seint oswold þe bissop was ibore here in EngelondeOf heie men
                    he was icome as ich vnderstonde…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…ffor his loue oure louerd haþ þer vair miracle ofte
                    iwroȝtNou god lete us to þe ioie come þat he is Inne
                    ibroȝt
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.71-8.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Oswald þe bisschop was ybore in EngelondeOf heye men he
                    was ycome as ich vnderstonde…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…ffor his loue oure lord haþ þer ffayre miracles ofte
                    ywrouȝtNow god bringe vs to þe ioye of heuene þat he is ynne
                    ybrouȝt

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint oswold þe byschop was bore here in Englondeof hey men he
                    was ycome as ic vnderstonde…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…for his loue oure lord haþ fayr myracle y wroȝtgod
                    late ous to þulke ioie come þer he is in ybroȝt

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEint hoswold þe bissope was y bore here in engelond Of heye men he
                    was y come as y vnder stond…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…for is loue oure lord haþ þer feire miracle ofte y
                    wroȝt Nou god let vs to þe Ioye come þat he is inne y broȝt
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto oswaldo (f. 34v, in margin beside first line);
                        Oswaldus (RT)

BLAdd10626.First Lines:
Hit by fel þat þe erchebischope of euerwik was dedSire
                    Oskedel in his stede þey nome þorw many mannus red…
BLAdd10626.Last Lines:
…For his love our lorde haþe þe feyre myracle y
                    wroutGod leve vs to þt Ioye come þat he his inne y
                    brout
BLAdd10626.Note:
Lines 1-98 missing. Text has facing transcription of each folio in a
                    nineteenth-century hand.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint oswald þe bischop was ibore here in engelondeOf heiemen he was icome as ich vnderstonde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …for his loue our lord haþ þer fair miracle owt ywroȝtnow god lete ows to þe ioie come þat he is Inne ybrouȝt
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xviii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 30v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Oswold bore was here in engelondeOf heiȝe men he was come as ich vnderstonde…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …And wiþ angles to heuene wende as hi brouȝte him erndingeNow god for þe loue of him to þulke ioie vs bringe

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt oswolde þe busschop was ybore here in engelondeOf heie men he was ycome as ich it vndirstonde…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Vor is loue oure louird haþ þer vaire myracle ywroȝtNou god ous granty þilke Ioye þat he is inne ybroȝt

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEint oswold þe bissop was ibore here in engelondeOf heye men he was icome as ich vnder stonde…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …ffor is loue oure louerd haþ þere fair miracle ofte iwrȝtNou god lete us to þe ioie come þat he is Inne ibroȝt
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto oswaldo (rubric in margin, f. 18v)

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Oswald þat gode mon born was in EnglondAnd comen of
                    riche men & hegh as ȝe shul vnderstonde
Lam223.Last Lines:
…ffor his love oure lord has here fayre myracles wroȝtGod
                    braunte vs to þat ioye come þat he is in now broȝt
